Class ViewData

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.model.data.ViewData
public final class ViewData extends Object
Data transfer object containing all view-related information for rendering. This class encapsulates the current brick shape, position, next brick preview, ghost brick position, and rotation metadata.

ViewData is immutable and provides defensive copies of mutable data.

See Also:
  • BoardRenderer

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewData

      public ViewData(int[][] brickData, int xPosition, int yPosition, int[][] nextBrickData)
      Constructs ViewData with basic brick information.
      Parameters:
      brickData - the current brick shape matrix
      xPosition - the horizontal position
      yPosition - the vertical position
      nextBrickData - the next brick shape matrix

    • ViewData

      public ViewData(int[][] brickData, int xPosition, int yPosition, int[][] nextBrickData, int ghostYPosition)
      Constructs ViewData with ghost position.
      Parameters:
      brickData - the current brick shape matrix
      xPosition - the horizontal position
      yPosition - the vertical position
      nextBrickData - the next brick shape matrix
      ghostYPosition - the Y position where the brick would land

    • ViewData

      public ViewData(int[][] brickData, int xPosition, int yPosition, List<int[][]> nextBricksData, int ghostYPosition)
      Constructs ViewData with multiple next brick previews.
      Parameters:
      brickData - the current brick shape matrix
      xPosition - the horizontal position
      yPosition - the vertical position
      nextBricksData - list of next brick shape matrices
      ghostYPosition - the Y position where the brick would land

    • ViewData

      public ViewData(int[][] brickData, int xPosition, int yPosition, int[][] nextBrickData, int ghostYPosition, int currentRotationIndex, int rotationStateCount, int rotationsUsed)
      Constructs ViewData with full rotation metadata.
      Parameters:
      brickData - the current brick shape matrix
      xPosition - the horizontal position
      yPosition - the vertical position
      nextBrickData - the next brick shape matrix
      ghostYPosition - the Y position where the brick would land
      currentRotationIndex - the current rotation state index
      rotationStateCount - total number of rotation states
      rotationsUsed - number of rotations used for current brick

    • ViewData

      public ViewData(int[][] brickData, int xPosition, int yPosition, List<int[][]> nextBricksData, int ghostYPosition, int currentRotationIndex, int rotationStateCount, int rotationsUsed)
      Constructs ViewData with multiple next bricks and rotation metadata.
      Parameters:
      brickData - the current brick shape matrix
      xPosition - the horizontal position
      yPosition - the vertical position
      nextBricksData - list of next brick shape matrices
      ghostYPosition - the Y position where the brick would land
      currentRotationIndex - the current rotation state index
      rotationStateCount - total number of rotation states
      rotationsUsed - number of rotations used for current brick

  • Method Details

    • getBrickData

      public int[][] getBrickData()
      Returns a copy of the current brick shape matrix.
      Returns:
      defensive copy of the brick data

    • getXPosition

      public int getXPosition()
      Returns the horizontal position of the brick.
      Returns:
      the X position (column index)

    • getYPosition

      public int getYPosition()
      Returns the vertical position of the brick.
      Returns:
      the Y position (row index)

    • getGhostYPosition

      public int getGhostYPosition()
      Returns the Y position where the ghost brick is displayed. This shows where the brick would land if dropped.
      Returns:
      the ghost brick Y position

    • getNextBricksData

      public List<int[][]> getNextBricksData()
      Returns copies of all next brick preview data.
      Returns:
      list of next brick shape matrices

    • getCurrentRotationIndex

      public int getCurrentRotationIndex()
      Returns the current rotation state index.
      Returns:
      rotation index (0 to rotationStateCount-1)

    • getRotationStateCount

      public int getRotationStateCount()
      Returns the total number of rotation states for the current brick.
      Returns:
      the rotation state count

    • getRotationsUsed

      public int getRotationsUsed()
      Returns the number of rotations used for the current brick.
      Returns:
      rotations used count
